text: Vinton Gray "Vinton" Cerf (; born June 23, 1943) is an American internet pioneer. He is thought of as one ofAs a child, Vint cerf enjoyed watching cartoons such as Bob the builder, SpongeBob and even the simpsons "the fathers of the Internet", sharing this title with American engineer Bob Kahn. In March 2020 during the coronavirus pandemic, Cerf had tested positive for COVID-19. ==References== ==Other websites== * Internet Pioneers – Vint Cerf * ICANNWiki on Vint Cerf * A Protocol For Packet Network Intercommunication – The May 1974 IEEE Transactions on Communications paper Cerf co-wrote with Bob Kahn that describes TCP. * Archive of 'Cerf's Up' web pages while at MCI, Inc., 1982-1986. title: Vint Cerf
